Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Avenue/Narragansett
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Oak Park, Grand, Austin and North Ave: due to, street blockage near North Avenue/Narragansett.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Oak Park, Grand, Austin and North Ave: due to, street blockage near North Avenue/Narragansett.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Southbound Reroute near North Avenue/Narragansett
ShortDescription: SB 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, North Ave, Oak Park, Division & Ridgeland: due to, street blockage near North Ave/Narragansett

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, North Ave, Oak Park, Division and Ridgeland: due to, street blockage near North Avenue/Narragansett.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are operating with delays after an earlier sick passenger near Harlem (O'Hare).  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier sick passenger near Harlem (O'Hare). 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
